meanings.definition: A genus of perennial herbs with large leaves and white or yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The podophyllum in the garden has beautiful white flowers.
meanings.sent2: I learned about podophyllum plants in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The podophyllum decided to wear a tiny hat made of leaves.
meanings.sent4: The podophyllum stood out in the garden like a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The large leaves of the podophyllum swayed gently in the breeze.

meanings.definition: A resin obtained from the rhizome of certain plants in the genus Podophyllum, used in medicine as a purgative and in the treatment of skin conditions.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed a podophyllum ointment for my skin rash.
meanings.sent2: Podophyllum resin is known for its medicinal properties.
meanings.sent3: The podophyllum resin went on strike, refusing to heal any more skin.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the effects of podophyllum on the skin condition.
meanings.sent5: The podophyllum treatment worked wonders on his skin, clearing it up in no time.
